activities: Gateway hosts the eCommerce web sites of its customers who sell tickets, passes and merchandise to its respective guests. Gateway's web site software enables collection of name, username, password, address, birth date, e-mail address, credit card number, etc that is deemed necessary for collection by each individual customer to run their businesses. The collection of said data is primarily used for order fulfillment for their guests to make online purchases. Each customer can chose what data they require to capture and store for their own business need. Gateway is a Level 1 PCI-DSS validated service provider with an on-site audit performed annually.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data processed by Gateway is client data collected in online shopping transactions. It is not manually processed.
recoursemech: Complaints can be submitted directly to Gateway for resolution via e-mail. In house policies and training procedures enforce the proper handling and timely resolution of requests. Gateway commits to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the EU.
